channel.title: [PI] Monster Wont Respawn
channel.description: On my server monsters never respawn! I have a 317 PI can someone help!?!? I used the base google v2

item.title: [PI] Monster Wont Respawn
item.dc:creator: @extinct2255 extinct2255

And i wonder why people bother helping people on these threads…

i post a fix i get ignored

item.title: [PI] Monster Wont Respawn
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

[quote=“Rash, post:6, topic:383842”][quote author=belhelmiel link=topic=479603.msg3512143#msg3512143 date=1298668226]

go to data/cfg/spawn-config
and add
spawn = npc IDawnX spawnY height walk maxhit attack defence description
like this
spawn = 50 2271 4698 0 1 25 500 350 King Black Dragon

Fucking read dumb fuck. OMFG, It’s the respawn I’m not as stupid as you, I know how to spawn monsters. They won’t respawn thats the problem >.> I wish I had enough rep to take off of yours!

@hawkgames
I put them in the auto-spawn file. I didn’t spawn them with the command. :s
[/quote]

I was going to help you, till i saw that[/quote]I would usually not care but since its you Rash x_x btw I used runefx ty for making it I got $250 from it :D!!! I still have my server online but I used something I coded

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Monster Wont Respawn
item.dc:creator: @extinct2255 extinct2255
item.description:
@extinct2255 wrote:

NpcHandler.

Search

getRespawnTime

add
case **** // Npc id.
return ****; // seconds till respawn

Example for my Corp beast respawn

case 3021: return 100;

Read full topic
